[ Obsolete | The ECLiPSe Built-In Predicates | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

coroutine

Switches on the coroutine flag, equivalent to set_flag(coroutine, on).

This built-in predicate is obsolete!

Description

Used to switch the global coroutine-flag to on. This causes a subset of the built-in predicates not to raise instantiation faults any longer but to delay instead. This concerns all sufficiently logical predicates like the arithmetic built-ins, functor/3, arg/3, and many others.

Fail Conditions

None.

Resatisfiable

No.

Examples

[eclipse 1]: X>0.
instantiation fault in X > 0
[eclipse 2]: coroutine.

yes.
[eclipse 3]: X>0.

X = X

Delayed goals:
        X > 0
yes.

See Also

set_flag / 2
